briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Safety, Efficacy and Pharmacokinetics of Teduglutide in Japanese Subjects With PN-dependent Short Bowel Syndrome (SBS)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
This study has 3 stages, consisting of an optimization/stabilization period (Stage 1), a 24-week treatment period in which all patients will receive teduglutide (Stage 2), and a long-term extension (Stage 3).

During the long-term extension (Stage 3), patients will continue to receive teduglutide for up to an additional 24 months or until teduglutide is commercially available, whichever comes earlier.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 2: Absolute Change From Baseline in Weekly Parenteral Support (PS) Volume at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute change from baseline in weekly PS volume at Week 24 was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 2: Percent Change From Baseline in Weekly Parenteral Support (PS) Volume at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in weekly PS volume at Week 24 was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 2: Percentage of Participants Who Demonstrate Response to Teduglutide at End of Stage 2
outcomeMeasures.description: Response was defined as the achievement of at least a 20% reduction from baseline (Visit 2) in weekly PS volume at Week 20 and again at Week 24.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 2: Absolute Change From Baseline in Number of Days Per Week of Parenteral Support (PS) Usage at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute change from baseline in number of days per Week of PS usage at Week 24 was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 2: Absolute Change From Baseline in Plasma Citrulline Levels at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Plasma citrulline was measured as an assessment of enterocyte mass. Absolute change from baseline in plasma citrulline levels at Week 24 was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 2: Percent Change From Baseline in Plasma Citrulline Levels at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Plasma citrulline was measured as an assessment of enterocyte mass. Percent change from baseline in plasma citrulline at Week 24 was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 2: Number of Participants Who Achieved Enteral Autonomy at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Enteral autonomy was defined as no prescribed PS and no use of PS recorded in the participant diary at the end of stage 2. Number of participants who achieved enteral autonomy at Week 24 was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 3: Absolute Change From Baseline in Weekly Parenteral Support (PS) Volume at Extension Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute change from baseline in weekly PS volume at extension Month 24 was reported. Extension month 24 = 30 months of teduglutide treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 3: Percent Change From Baseline in Weekly Parenteral Support (PS) Volume at Extension Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in weekly PS volume at extension Month 24 was reported. Extension month 24 = 30 months of teduglutide treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 3: Absolute Change From Baseline in Number of Days Per Week of Parenteral Support (PS) Usage at Extension Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute change from baseline in number of days per Week of PS usage at extension Month 24 was reported. Extension month 24 = 30 months of teduglutide treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 3: Absolute Change From Baseline in Plasma Citrulline Levels at Extension Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Plasma citrulline was measured as an assessment of enterocyte mass. Absolute change from baseline in plasma citrulline levels at extension Month 24 was reported. Extension month 24 = 30 months of teduglutide treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 3: Percent Change From Baseline in Plasma Citrulline Levels at Extension Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Plasma citrulline was measured as an assessment of enterocyte mass. Percent change from baseline in plasma citrulline at extension Month 24 was reported. Extension month 24 = 30 months of teduglutide treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 4: Absolute Change From Baseline in Weekly Parenteral Support (PS) Volume at End of Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute change from baseline in weekly PS volume at end of treatment was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 4: Percent Change From Baseline in Weekly Parenteral Support (PS) Volume at End of Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in weekly PS volume at end of treatment was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 4: Absolute Change From Baseline in Number of Days Per Week of Parenteral Support (PS) Usage at End of Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute change from baseline in number of days per week of PS usage at end of treatment was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 4: Absolute Change From Baseline in Plasma Citrulline Levels at End of Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Plasma citrulline was measured as an assessment of enterocyte mass. Absolute change from baseline in plasma citrulline levels at end of treatment was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stage 4: Percent Change From Baseline in Plasma Citrulline Levels at End of Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Plasma citrulline was measured as an assessment of enterocyte mass. Percent change in plasma citrulline from baseline at end of treatment was reported.

outcomeMeasures.title: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity (AUC0-Inf) of Teduglutide in Plasma
outcomeMeasures.description: Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity of teduglutide in plasma were evaluated.

outcomeMeasures.title: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to the Last Time Point (AUC0-t) of Teduglutide in Plasma
outcomeMeasures.description: Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to the last time point of teduglutide in plasma were evaluated.

outcomeMeasures.title: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of Teduglutide in Plasma
outcomeMeasures.description: Maximum concentration of teduglutide in plasma were evaluated.

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Drug Concentration (Tmax) of Teduglutide in Plasma
outcomeMeasures.description: Time to reach maximum observed drug concentration of teduglutide in plasma was evaluated.

outcomeMeasures.title: Terminal Half-Life (t1/2) of Teduglutide in Plasma
outcomeMeasures.description: Terminal half-life of teduglutide in plasma were evaluated.

outcomeMeasures.title: Apparent Clearance (CL/F) of Teduglutide in Plasma
outcomeMeasures.description: Apparent clearance of teduglutide in plasma were evaluated.

outcomeMeasures.title: Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vz/F) of Teduglutide in Plasma
outcomeMeasures.description: Apparent volume of distribution of teduglutide in plasma were evaluated.
